__prompts__.deployment: What is the name of the deployment?
__prompts__.integration_name: What is the name of the integration?
__prompts__.passphrase_id: What is the PHAB passphrase id with the credentials for the DHIS2 instance?
__prompts__.hierarchical_locations: What are the location levels from DHIS2? Each level should be in single quotes and separated by a space.
__prompts__.gen_priority: What is the priority for the generation step?
__prompts__.proc_priority: What is the priority for the process step?
__prompts__.minio_path: What is the mc compatible path to the Minio or S3 bucket?
__prompts__.default_disaggregation: What is the default disaggregation? Can be found at `/api/categoryOptionCombos.json?paging=false` with name `default`
__prompts__.dhis2_domain: What is the domain name of the DHIS2 instance?
__prompts__.instance_name: What is the name of the DHIS2 instance? This is only applicable if multiple instances are hosted on the same dhis2 domain.
__prompts__.nation: What is the name of the nation ID? Can be found at `api/organisationUnits.json?paging=false` with the lowest level
__prompts__.prefix: This prefix will be used to prepend to DHIS2 IDs in Zenysis. Useful for DHIS2 instances that share dataElement IDs.
__prompts__.data_start_date: What is the start date of the data? Format: YYYYMM
